rows.w: nuzba fa lo nu mi pu te vecnu pa fonxa
rows.d: The news are that I bought a phone.

rows.w: lo du'u no da nuzba cu xamgu nuzba
rows.d: No news are good news.

rows.w: mi ba citka lo omle be lo sovda jo'u lo tamca
rows.d: I will eat an omelette made with eggs and tomatoes.

rows.w: mi pacna fi li so'a fe lo nu solri ba zi
rows.d: I hope it will be sunny soon.

rows.w: mi pacna fi li so'u fe lo nu do klama
rows.d: I wish you came.

rows.w: lo risna cu pagbu lo xadni
rows.d: Heart is a part of body.

rows.w: lo trene mo'u pagre lo manku kevna pa nurma lo jarbu
rows.d: The train passed the dark hole to reach a rural area from the suburbs of the city.

rows.w: lo te cange pu pajni lo du'u xu kau lo grute cu makcu
rows.d: The farmer was deciding whether fruits were ripe.

rows.w: pu se palci do fa lo ka lebna lo jdini
rows.d: It was wicked of you to take money.

rows.w: xu do ca dasni lo palku
rows.d: Are you wearing trousers?

rows.w: mi pu cpare lo palma tricu
rows.d: I climbed a palm tree.

rows.w: ti palne lo palta jo'u lo kabri
rows.d: This is a tray with plates and cups on it.

rows.w: mi palpi lo sefta be lo najnimre i ri se sefta lo xutla
rows.d: I can touch-feel the surface of an orange. It is soft.

rows.w: mi pu jai gau porpi fai lo palta
rows.d: I broke a plate.

rows.w: lo palta pu gau co'a porpi
rows.d: The plate got broken.

rows.w: ti pambe lo vacri lo xislu lo bartu
rows.d: This is a pump for filling up the air into wheels from the outside.

rows.w: mi sumne lo panci be lo najnimre i ri se panci lo xrula
rows.d: I can smell a scent of an orange. It has a scent of flowers.

rows.w: mi te panci lo najnimre lo xrula
rows.d: I can smell an orange smelling of flowers.

rows.w: lo kumfa cu je'a se panci lo mabla
rows.d: The room really stinks.

rows.w: iu nai panci fa lo kalci
rows.d: Yuck, it smells like shit.

rows.w: lo panje cu cokcu lo so'i djacu
rows.d: The sponge absorbs a lot of water.

rows.w: mi se pluka lo ka cadzu bu'u lo panka fau lo ka kansa loi pendo be mi
rows.d: I like to walk in the parks with my friends.

rows.w: ti panlo lo nanba
rows.d: This is a slice of bread.

rows.w: lo mensi ca panpi lo bruna be vo'a
rows.d: The sister is now at piece with her brother.

rows.w: zo pacna zo kanpe panra lo ka valsi lo ka djica
rows.d: The word {pacna} is parallel to {kanpe} differing in that {pacna} describes desire and {kanpe} doesn't.

rows.w: za'u pa gunka pu pante lo ka te pleji ma kau vau loi turni ta'i lo ka de'a gunka
rows.d: Workers complained about their salary to the management by halting their work.

rows.w: lo nixli cu panzi la alis
rows.d: The girl is Alice's child.

rows.w: ko catlu ti noi papri lo cukta
rows.d: Look at this page of the book.

rows.w: li re parbi li vo li re
rows.d: 2 is the ratio of 4 with respect to 2.

rows.w: lo cmalu cu parbi lo temci be lo cabna bei lo nu cliva vau lo temci be lo nu cliva bei lo nu volta
rows.d: It's a small fraction of the time from now until leaving with respect to the time from leaving until returning.

rows.w: lo vi curnu cu parji lo xarju
rows.d: This worm is a parasite in pigs.

rows.w: do poi dasni ti noi pastu cu simlu lo ka citno nixli
rows.d: In this dress, you look like a young girl.

rows.w: lo patfu be mi cu gunka bu'u la tokiios
rows.d: My father works in Tokio.

rows.w: lo patfu be mi cu gunka bu'u la tokiios
rows.d: My father works in New York.

rows.w: au pei stasu lo patlu
rows.d: Would you like potato soup?

rows.w: mi pu bevri pa patxu be lo djacu
rows.d: I brought a pot of water.

rows.w: mi pu ciska pa xatra lo blabi pelji
rows.d: I wrote a letter on a white paper.

rows.w: xu do su'o roi smaka lo rusko pelmeni
rows.d: Have you at least once tasted Russian pelmeni?

rows.w: lo'e badna cu pelxu
rows.d: A typical banana is yellow.

rows.w: mi finti lo pemci be lo vrici prenu
rows.d: I create poems about different people.

rows.w: tu penbi lo blanu e nai lo xekri
rows.d: That is a blue, not black pen.

rows.w: mi pu pencu lo vorme ta'i lo ka pilno pa canpa
rows.d: I touched a worm with a spade.
